Job Posting:164782 - Position: S25 IT Security Analyst Intern 164782B E1 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 01/30/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 01/24/2025 11:00 AM Expired ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Country Intuitive Surgical, Inc Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Salary Range $ Job Description 2025 - Summer S25 IT Security Analyst Intern 164782B E1 Co-op Position Sunnyvale, CA United States 4 months In-Person US 0.0 per hour for 0 Major List $85,280-$112,320 Company Description At Intuitive, we are united behind our mission: we believe that minimally invasive care is life-enhancing care. Through ingenuity and intelligent technology, we expand the potential of physicians to heal without constraints. As a pioneer and market leader in robotic-assisted surgery, we strive to foster an inclusive and diverse team, committed to making a difference. For more than 25 years, we have worked with hospitals and care teams around the world to help solve some of healthcare's hardest challenges and advance what is possible. Intuitive has been built by the efforts of great people from diverse backgrounds. We believe great ideas can come from anywhere. We strive to foster an inclusive culture built around diversity of thought and mutual respect. We lead with inclusion and empower our team members to do their best work as their most authentic selves. Passionate people who want to make a difference drive our culture. Our team members are grounded in integrity, have a strong capacity to learn, the energy to get things done, and bring diverse, real world experiences to help us think in new ways. We actively invest in our team members to support their long-term growth so they can continue to advance our mission and achieve their highest potential. Join a team committed to taking big leaps forward for a global community of healthcare professionals and their patients. Together, let's advance the world of minimally invasive care. Job Description Primary Function of Position The intern position will assist the IT Security team in ensuring the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of Intuitive's information systems and data. This role will provide an opportunity to gain involved experience across various cybersecurity domains, such as security awareness, vulnerability assessment, configuration hardening, threat monitoring, incident response, security operations, and related areas. Specific responsibilities will be explained by the hiring manager. Essential Job Duties • Partner with cross-functional teams to ensure compliance with security policies and procedures. • Help the implementation and maintenance of security controls and related technologies. • Monitor and examine security events and alerts to identify potential cyber threats. • Assist in the development and delivery of cybersecurity documentation materials. • Work closely with cross-functional Information Technology (IT) teams and other stakeholders in the organization. Qualifications Required Skills and Experience • Technical knowledge of computer networks and/or operating systems. • Solid knowledge of cybersecurity principles and technologies. • Proven critical and problem-solving skills. • Excellent communication and synergy abilities. Ability to handle confidential and delicate information with integrity. • Required Education and Training • Current enrollment in a cybersecurity, computer science, information systems, or a related degree-seeking program at the Bachelor's level. • Master's level students would also be considered based on specific relevant experience. Additional Information Due to the nature of our business and the role, please note that Intuitive and/or your customer(s) may require that you show current proof of vaccination against certain diseases including COVID-19. Details can vary by role. Intuitive is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. We provide equal employment opportunities to all qualified applicants and employees, and prohibit discrimination and harassment of any type, without regard to race, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, color, age, religion, protected veteran or disability status, genetic information or any other status protected under federal, state, or local applicable laws. We will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records in accordance with fair chance laws. We provide market-competitive compensation packages, inclusive of base pay, incentives, benefits, and equity. It would not be typical for someone to be hired at the top end of range for the role, as actual pay will be determined based on several factors, including experience, skills, and qualifications. The target salary ranges are listed. Details can vary by role. Intuitive is an Equal Employment Opportunity / Affirmative Action Employer. We provide equal employment opportunities to all qualified applicants and employees, and prohibit discrimination and harassment of any type, without regard to race, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, color, age, religion, protected veteran or disability status, genetic information or any other status protected under federal, state, or local applicable laws. EEO and AA Policy We will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records in accordance with fair chance laws. We provide market-competitive compensation packages, inclusive of base pay (paid at an hourly rate), benefits, and a housing allowance. It would not be typical for someone to be hired at the top end of range for the role, as actual pay will be determined based on several factors, including relevant skills and experience for this internship, degree-seeking academic program (PhD, Master's, Bachelor's, etc), year in school, and location. The hourly rate is prorated against the intern program salaries listed and total program compensation will be based on internship duration. Base Salary Range Region 1: $99,840 USD - $112,320 USD Base Salary Range Region 2: $85,280 USD - $95,680 USD Shift: Day Travel: None Workplace Type: Set Schedule - This job will be onsite weekly, the percentage of onsite work will be defined by the leader.
